column5: Charming home in Bellaire with 2 bedrooms, a study/TV room, living and dining rooms and one bathroom. plenty of natural light and a great yard in a extremely safe and central neighborhood of Bellaire. The house is located inside the inner loop (610). Great restaurants and grocery stores in less than 5 minutes drive. Perfect for medical center( 4 Miles) and Galleria (3 Miles) visitors. Evergreen pool within walking distance. Extra mattress is available upon request.
